message: I've tried a bunch, but I've settled on LauncherPro for the moment.
btw, I just love the clean and simple interface and the github wallpaper: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18383151/android/snap20110404_194838.png
ADW EX. I have tried them all and I usually end up back with ADW
adw launcher, as it comes bundled with cyanogen mod and works perfectly fine for me
I've tried ADW Launcher, Launcher Pro, and now using (and liking!) Zeam on my gTablet.
ADW Launcher for my Huawei X5
I'm a huge fan of Launcher Pro, I love the screen transitions
Go Launcher EX - I like hiding and folder support in the app drawer, and that you can see folders' contents. I really wish I could use MIUI's launcher in different ROM (I use Cyanogen)
Zeam Launcher, lightweight and not too fancy
@danielr Zeam is a really nice launcher.
